HullMod.dcp_DME_DMEAllIncomp: This ship cannot install the following hullmods:
HullMod.dcp_magellan_magellanAllIncomp: This ship cannot install the following hullmods:
HullMod.dcp_DME_MonoblocDescRThresh: Weapon range reduced by %s above %s/%s/%s/%s units, depending on hull size.
HullMod.dcp_DME_ReactionFurnaceDesc4: Increases the 0-flux speed boost by %s at up to %s of the ship's flux.
HullMod.dcp_DME_ReactionFurnaceDesc5: Reduces damage taken from solar coronas and hyperspace storms by %s.
HullMod.dcp_DME_RefurbDesc1: Improves the repair rate of this ship by %s.
HullMod.dcp_DME_ComCrewDesc1: Reduces crew and fighter casualties by %s percent, and engine and weapon repair times by %s.
HullMod.dcp_DME_ComCrewDesc2: Reduces the rate at which fighter replacement rate decreases by %s.
HullMod.dcp_DME_BBEngDesc1: All non-missile small/medium/large weapons receive a %s/%s/%s discount.
HullMod.dcp_DME_BBEngDesc4: Damage taken from solar coronas and hyperspace storms reduced by %s.
HullMod.dcp_DME_BBAssaultDesc1: Increases top speed by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size, and further increases as the ship builds hard flux.
HullMod.dcp_DME_BBAssaultDesc3: Flux dissipation is increased by a factor of %s.
HullMod.dcp_DME_BBAssaultDesc4: Prevents active venting, and reduces weapon range past %s units.
HullMod.dcp_DME_BBDefenseDesc1: Increases shield efficiency by %s, and reduces penetration by shield-piercing weapons.
HullMod.dcp_DME_BBDefenseDesc2: Reduces incoming HE and Energy damage by %s.
HullMod.dcp_DME_BBDefenseDesc3: Increases weapon and engine health by %s.
HullMod.dcp_DME_BBDefenseDescFtr: Fighters take %s less armor and hull damage.
HullMod.dcp_DME_BBSupportDesc1: Increases weapon range by a flat %s/%s/%s/%s units, depending on hull size.
HullMod.dcp_DME_BBSupportDescFtr: Fighter weapon range increased by %s units.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagellanAllIncomp: This ship cannot install the following hullmods:
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagellanEngDesc4: Chances of D-mods on recovery reduced by %s.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagellanArmorDesc1: Maximum damage reduction by armor is reduced by %s, for a total of %s.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagellanArmorDesc2: Weapon, engine, and hull damage is reduced by %s/%s/%s by hull size.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagellanArmorDesc3: Beam weapon and EMP damage taken reduced by %s.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagellanBaysDesc1: Adds %s/%s/%s fighter bays to this ship, by hull size.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagellanBaysDesc2: Fighter refit time is increased by %s.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_ClassicDesc1: Ballistic and energy weapon range increased by %s.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_ClassicDesc3: The maximum number of permanent hullmods is increased by %s.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_SpartacusReactorDesc1: All energy weapons receive a %s/%s/%s discount.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_SpartacusReactorDesc3: The ship's EMP damage taken ranges from %s to %s, depending on flux level.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_SpartacusReactorDesc4: The ship's %s increases by up to %s with hard flux level.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_BlackcollarModDesc7: Chance of critical weapon and engine malfunctions at low CR reduced by %s.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_StartigerModDesc5: High Explosive damage taken reduced by %s.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_LevellerRefitDesc2: Non-beam energy weapon range is increased by %s.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_LevellerRefitDesc3: Flux dissipation increased %s/%s/%s/%s, by hull size.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_HerdRefitDesc3: Top speed increased %s/%s/%s/%s, by hull size.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_YellowtailModDesc5: Top speed increased %s/%s/%s/%s, by hull size.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_AllRefitHangarDesc: This ship has a fixed fighter wing LPC if %s is installed.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagSpecialCompatFrigate: Can not be installed on a frigate
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagSpecialCompatDestroyer: Can not be installed on a destroyer
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagSpecialCompatCruiser: Can not be installed on a cruiser
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagSpecialCompatCapital: Can not be installed on a capital ship
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagSpecialCompatHasBays: Ship already has standard fighter bays
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagSpecialCompatNoBays: Ship does not have standard fighter bays
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagSpecialCompatPhase: Can not be installed on a phase ship
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagSpecialCompat1: Can only install one proprietary hullmod at a time
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagSpecialCompat2: Must be installed on a Magellan ship
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MagSpecialCompat3: Cannot be installed on this ship
HullMod.dcp_magellan_DefenseSPDesc3: Fragmentation damage to armor and hull is reduced by %s.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_DefenseQuote: "You can't take every hit on your chin, and if you try, you just end up on your back, wondering why the ceiling spins so fast."
HullMod.dcp_magellan_DefenseAttrib: attributed to Magellan boxer Romann Bermejo
HullMod.dcp_magellan_FighterSPDesc1: The size of this ship's fighter wings is increased by %s/%s/%s, depending on the wing's size, up to a maximum wing size of %s fighters.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_FighterSPDesc2: Fighter replacement time is increased by %s.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_FighterSPExDesc1: Wings with 3 or fewer fighters gain +1 additional chassis,
HullMod.dcp_magellan_FighterSPExDesc2: while wings with 4 fighters gain +2, and wings with 5 fighters gain +3.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_FighterSPExDesc3: Wings with 6 fighters gain only +2 additional chassis for the maximum of 8.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_FighterQuote: "You know what goes through a fighter pilot's head in combat? As little as possible, if she's good. Every thought is practical – or you die."
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MovementSPDesc1: Top speed increased by %s/%s/%s, depending on hull size. Zero-flux boost increased by %s.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MovementSPDesc2: Fuel use in hyperspace increased by %s.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MovementSPDesc3: Engine damage taken in combat is %s.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_MovementQuote: "Fire without maneuver is a waste of ammunition. Maneuver without fire is begging for someone to call in artillery on your last known position."
HullMod.dcp_magellan_ComCrewDesc2: Non-beam PD weapons receive a %s increase to range.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_ComCrewDesc3: All weapons do %s more damage to fighters.
HullMod.dcp_magellan_ComCrewQuote: "Oh aye, the 'decisive battle' doctrine – very popular upstairs. But ask the scuts who do the bleedin' and dyin' how it sounds t' them...'
HullMod.dcp_magellan_ComCrewAttrib: overheard in Jeshad Station enlisted mess

Strings.dcp_magellan_citywarrens_ef1: %s stability if controlled by a Magellan faction;
Strings.dcp_magellan_citywarrens_ef3: %s to the planet's defense rating if controlled by a Magellan faction;
Strings.dcp_magellan_citywarrens_quote: "Considering the circumstances, the food is good!"
Strings.dcp_magellan_str_armsmarket_quote: "The arms business is founded on human folly, whose depths will never be plumbed - and that's why it will go on forever."
